EmailTemplate.description: Deny partner applicant that doesn't meet the criteria we are looking for
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Application Denied - Unqualified
EmailTemplate.subject: Information Regarding your SunPower Partner Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting an application to become a SunPower dealer.
Based on our evaluation, you are not an ideal match for the type of organization SunPower is currently looking to partner with.
We would like to keep your information on file and continue the evaluation process should your qualifications meet our needs in the future.
Once again, we thank you for your time and interest.
Regards, {!User.FirstName}
SunPower Customer Care Team customercare@sunpowercorp.com www.sunpowercorp.com 1-800-SUNPOWER
